The following revision refers to this bug:
Enable the appcache by default and add a cmd line switch to optionally disable it.

Tasks remaining to leave it enabled are to hook into UI such that users can delete what 
appcached data exists where and can delete things.
(No comment was entered for this change.)

Teach the cookie tree view and model about appcaches.
Not hooked up to real data yet, but the view and model pieces are in place for windows and gtk (not yet done for the mac).
Also adds a 'name' attribute to database details pane, cleans up the layout of the detail panes on windows.
